markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Grabbing Trunk](/Actions.aspx?ID=1156) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 73</row>

</column>

---

The elephant grabs its foe with its trunk and carries it off. The elephant uses [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a creature up to two sizes smaller than the elephant in its trunk. If its target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33), the elephant repositions the target to another space in the elephant's reach.
name: Grabbing Trunk

text: Grabbing Trunk Two Actions Source Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra pg. 73 --- The elephant grabs its foe with its trunk and carries it off. The elephant uses Athletics to Grapple a creature up to two sizes smaller than the elephant in its trunk. If its target is grabbed or restrained, the elephant repositions the target to another space in the elephant's reach.
